overview.ovdesc:
This application is used to capture the valid
SYS.CODES, which can be used in the SYS.CODE field in ACCOUNT.PARAMETER. The description given here for SYS.CODES is used as an enrichment whenever these codes are used.

desc.p: This field will hold the description of the system code being defined. For e.g., For LD-PRIN , the description can be input as Principal liquidation LD.

This field can be expanded to allow the User to enter the Description of the AC.SYS.CODES in various languages. Each expansion of the field will correspond to a new Language as defined in the Language table, and will indicate to the User the Language in which the Description must be entered.
This description appears as enrichment whenever value in AC.SYS.CODES application is referred.
3-35 type A (alphanumeric) characters. Multilanguage field. (Mandatory input).

t.desc:
ID to this application is T24 Application and then an optional code. Example LD-PRIN, LD-INT, etc. A value of 'ALL' can be given
to default
Settlement
Accounts for all applications
Validation Rules:
ID must be alphanumeric
It should be given as
A-B
,
where A is mandatory T24 product
as specified in Company application or value as ALL, B is optional valid definition as per the relevant application.
For example for LD application the following codes can be used : PRIN,DD,INT.
